meanings.definition: To write or draw (something) again in a different way
meanings.sent1: She redrafts her essay to make it better.
meanings.sent2: He always redrafts his stories before sharing them.
meanings.sent3: The student redrafts his homework with colorful markers.
meanings.sent4: The artist redrafts her sketches like a sculptor shaping clay.
meanings.sent5: Redrafts can help improve the quality of your work.

meanings.definition: A revised version of a piece of writing or drawing
meanings.sent1: The redrafts of the novel were much clearer.
meanings.sent2: She keeps all her redrafts in a special folder.
meanings.sent3: The redrafts of the play made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His redrafts were like different puzzle pieces coming together.
meanings.sent5: The teacher praised the student's redrafts for their creativity.
